definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: My holidays plan arrive village life, that will let me forget many annoyance.
sentences.chinese: 我假期策动到屯子生活，那会让我忘却许多郁闷。

sentences.english: The plan has the added advantage of bringing employment to rural areas.
sentences.chinese: 该计划另有一个优点，就是给屯子带来了就业机会。
这个电台播放屯子音乐。

sentences.english: He has lived in the country for long.
sentences.chinese: 他在屯子生活了很长时间。

sentences.english: There are tax breaks for businesses that locate in rural areas.
sentences.chinese: 在屯子地区开办企业享有税收减轻免除。

sentences.english: I realized that knowledge is GREatly needed in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 我意识到屯子明明需要常识。

sentences.english: Hiding in the village eh? That's a coward's tactic, General.
sentences.chinese: 躲在屯子里了吗？那是胆小鬼的策略，将军。

sentences.english: Our village is not big, all the people can get along harmoniously.
sentences.chinese: 我们这个屯子不大，大家都能和睦相处。

definition: Liujia village in Zhangdian district 张店区 of Zhibo city 淄博市[Zi1 bo2 shi4], Shandong
baby/small child/(arch.) slave among ethnic minorities
educated youth (sent to work in farms during the Cultural Revolution)
